root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 16-8-1, translated into en
root.data:
a) Statistical Survey

The indicator “Proportion of children under 5 years old with birth registration” is compiled from data of the Population and Housing Census (10-year cycle), the mid-term population and housing census (5-year cycle) and extrapolated from the results of the annual population change - family planning sample survey. These Census and Census are all part of the National Statistical Census Program.

b) National statistical reporting mode: Table No. 002.N/BCB-TP
